Discover Bvlgari watches novelties:

node.text:
Watch as @lucia_silvestri takes you on a journey of color. In this video, the Bvlgari Creative Director invites you into the world of the Magnifica collection — giving you an exclusive look at some vibrant gemstones and dreamlike jewels.
.
.
Video by: @spkmore 
Music @guazzonemarco 
Cover by @monsieurtok 
Galleria images:
Director @tommaso.ottomano / DOP @mrcodepa / Production @studio.april 
.
#Bvlgari #BvlgariJewelry #BvlgariHighJewelry #BvlgariMagnifica

node.text:
Like a portal into a fantastical world, the architecture of the Eternal City gives our muses a gateway into a dreamlike Rome. Watch as @lilyaldridge, @zendaya, @vittoria, and @lalalalisa_m describe what it was like to peer into the wonder of Magnifica and create Bvlgari’s ethereal Brand Campaign film.
.
.
Director & photographer: @txemayeste
Starring #Lisa #Zendaya #LilyAldridge #VittoriaCeretti for Bvlgari
.
.
#Bvlgari #BvlgariJewelry #BvlgariHighJewelry #DreamMagnificence #LifeIsMagnificent

node.text:
In this brief look behind the scenes we take you from Italy’s capital to its fashion capital. Inside the Galleria Vittorio Emanuele II, watch as every second of the show is planned out and meticulously brought to life, celebrating the film’s true stars — the Magnifica High Jewelry collection. 
.
.
Production company @illmatic_film_group_company 
Executive producer @jacopo.pica 
Directed by @gooooooooooooooooooooofy
Producer @annaliasilecchia 
Photographer (cover) @gabrieldelachapelle 
.
#Bvlgari #BvlgariJewelry  #BvlgariHighJewelry #BvlgariMagnifica

node.title: 'Magnifica' Opera d’Arte — From Rome to Milan.

node.text:
The vibrant inspiration of Rome returns to lift the hearts of the world. Shining into Italy’s fashion capital like a blinding ray of sunshine, Bvlgari presents its most exquisite High Jewelry collection to date. More than the launch of unparalleled works of jewelry craft, this is a resplendent celebration of rebirth. Honored through magnificent muses, music, and Milan, Bvlgari unveils the Magnifica High Jewelry collection at the heart of the Galleria Vittorio Emanuele II.
.
.
Models: @vittoria, @lilyaldridge @heconghc, @solangesmith and @blesnyaminher 
Special Guests: @andreabocelliofficial @beatricevenezi 
.
.
Project by @oma.eu
Director @tommaso.ottomano
DOP @mrcodepa
Stylist @sagliogeraldine (studio) @alicegentilucci (galleria)
Music @guazzonemarco 
Production @studio.april
. 
#Bvlgari #BvlgariJewelry #BvlgariHighJewelry #BvlgariMagnifica #Milan

node.text:
With two career GRAMMY nominations, seven studio albums, and nearly 3bn streams to his name, this live DJ set from @steveaoki promises to be spectacular. To celebrate the launch of the Bvlgari Aluminium Steve Aoki Special Edition watch, Bvlgari presents Steve Aoki live. Enjoy.
.
.
.
#Bvlgari #BvlgariWatches #BvlgariAluminium #SteveAoki #LiveConcert #SpecialGuestDJ

node.text:
In honor of the awards, @luxurylaw lays down the law on styling and jewelry for the Oscars. Known as the Image Architect, the fiercely talented super-stylist breaks down how he gets stars like @zendaya red carpet ready. This masterclass also gives you an up-close look at some stunning Bvlgari High Jewelry creations – including the exclusive Magnifica pieces Law used to create Zendaya’s jewelry story for this year's Academy Awards. 
.
.
.
#Bvlgari #BvlgariJewelry #93rdAcademyAwards #AcademyAwards #TheOscars #StarsInBvlgari

node.title: MASTERCLASS BY BVLGARI WITH LAW ROACH

node.text:
To our inspiration. To our incredible home. To the city of countless ancient adventures. To the city of the new stories yet to be lived and told. Celebrate the eternal city allure through the pages of “Bvlgari Roma: Travel Tales for Beauty Lovers” a one-of-a-kind guide to Rome’s renowned glamour.

Happy birthday Rome!

Directed by @oliverhl 
Aerial @snils @gianmarco.gabriele 
Music @federicoderoni 

#Bvlgari #Heritage #History #Roma #NataleDiRoma

node.text:
Unlocking the secrets of Serpenti.
The Bvlgari Watches Creative Director unravels the mystery of this breathtaking High Jewelry watch – the Serpenti Misteriosi Cleopatra. Listen as Fabrizio Buonamassa describes the intricacies of designing a watch within a pure High Jewelry piece, the sheer number of gemstones set into its hexagonal scales, and the unique way this intriguing Bvlgari creation fastens around the wrist. 
.
.
.
#Bvlgari #BvlgariWatches #BvlgariHighJewelry #Serpenti #SerpentiMisteriosiCleopatra #ColorTreasures #WatchesAndWonders2021

node.text:
A perfect synergy of creative energies.
Listen as Bvlgari Watches Creative Director, Fabrizio Buonamassa, discusses working with internationally renowned architect, @tadao.ando. Together, they created a timepiece that harmonizes a Japanese expression of the nature of time with uniquely Italian codes of design.
.

node.text:
In this exclusive gemstone masterclass, Bvlgari Creative Director, @lucia_silvestri, guides you through the first chapter of the Maison’s Color Journeys experience – the Paraiba High Jewelry collection. Watch as Lucia shows you dazzling Paraiba tourmaline gems and the breathtaking High Jewelry creations Bvlgari crafts then into. 

#Bvlgari #BvlgariHighJewelry #BvlgariColorJourneys #Paraiba  #Masterclass

node.text:
With every record-breaking year, Bvlgari advances its expertise in the design and manufacture of Haute Horology timepieces. Listen as Bvlgari Watches Creative Director, Fabrizio Buonamassa, shares his thoughts on the past triumphs of the Octo Finissimo collection – and what the new perpetual calendar means for the evolution of the saga.
.
.
.
#Bvlgari #BvlgariWatches #OctoFinissimo #EsteticaDellaMeccanica #WatchesAndWonders2021

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by BVLGARI Official in Geneva Switzerland. May be an image of wrist watch.

node.text:
Taking timeless timepieces to new horizons.
Uniting a black steel livery with sandblasted surfaces, the 58-faceted Octo Roma WorldTimer is ready to take on the globe. Fully inhabiting the concept of Bvlgari’s open invitation to travel, its 24-time zone functionality makes every city a home away from home.
.
.
.
#Bvlgari #BvlgariWatches #Octo #OctoRoma #TheJewelerOfTime #GenevaWatchDays

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by BVLGARI Official on August 31, 2021. May be an image of wrist watch.

node.text:
From Rome to the world.
Ready to explore the globe, Bvlgari presents the Octo Roma WorldTimer in black, or satin-brushed and polished steel. The innovative dial displays home and local time across all 24 time zones — giving you a sense of connection to your loved ones wherever you are in the world.
.
.
.
#Bvlgari #BvlgariWatches #Octo #OctoRoma #TheJewelerOfTime #GenevaWatchDays

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by BVLGARI Official on August 31, 2021. May be an image of wrist watch.

node.text:
Making timepieces timeless.
Bvlgari’s dedication to craft opens up endless possibilities. The Octo Roma WorldTimer gives you all 24 time zones in two striking color profiles. And the opulent Divas’ Dream Minute Repeater will artistically charm with a breathtaking diamond mosaic.
.
.
.
#Bvlgari #BvlgariWatches #Octo #OctoRoma #DivasDream #TheJewelerOfTime #GenevaWatchDays

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by BVLGARI Official on August 30, 2021. May be an image of wrist watch.

node.text:
An open invitation to travel.
The Jeweler of Time unveils its limitless creativity at this year’s Geneva Watch Days. The Octo Roma embraces travel, taking flight through innovation and design flair. And Bulgari takes you on a dreamlike journey — reimagining the iconic Divas’ Dream motif in a lavish array of new timepieces. 
.
.
.
#Bvlgari #BvlgariWatches #Octo #OctoRoma #DivasDream #TheJewelerOfTime #GenevaWatchDays

node.text:
Off the beaten track. 
Stride into a summer of thrills wearing Bvlgari’s fearless B.zero1 collection. These pieces strike the perfect balance between intrinsic wearability and visionary craftsmanship. Shop bold. Discover the icon online now.
.
.
Photo: @vanmosseveldeplusn 
Styling: @agata_belcen
.
#Bvlgari #BvlgariJewelry #Bzero1 #MagnificentSummer #BvlgariSummer

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by BVLGARI Official on August 29, 2021. May be an image of jewelry.

node.text:
Rosy horizons. 
The B.zero1 pendant necklace is the ultimate in self-expression. The courageous spirit of this rose gold design reflects Bvlgari's exceptional artistry — and its unique ability to extend the boundaries of creativity. 
.
.
.
#Bvlgari #BvlgariJewelry #Bzero1 #MagnificentSummer #BvlgariSummer

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by BVLGARI Official on August 28, 2021. May be a closeup of 1 person and wrist watch.

node.text:
Immaculate energy. 
Symbolizing the graceful fusion of tradition and innovation through its bold design, B.zero1 is the perfect accompaniment to your summer of adventure. Bvlgari merges the flawless power of this 18 kt rose gold with matte black ceramic inserts to create this intriguing and iconic ring.
.
.
Photo: @vanmosseveldeplusn 
Styling: @agata_belcen
.
#Bvlgari #BvlgariJewelry #Bzero1 #MagnificentSummer #BvlgariSummer

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by BVLGARI Official on August 28, 2021. May be an image of purse.

node.text:
Tickled pink.
The intriguing contrast between the distinctive soft matelassé pattern and the bold metal details evokes the scintillating aura of the Serpenti Cabochon bag. The snakehead closure is a hypnotic feature, adding a layer of unrivaled Bvlgari allure. Shop now. 
.
.
.
#Serpenti #Bvlgari #BvlgariAccessories #MagnificentSummer #BvlgariSummer

node.accessibility_caption: Photo shared by BVLGARI Official on August 27, 2021 tagging @heconghc. May be an image of 1 person and sunglasses.

node.text:
A summer of bliss.
Sunny exuberance is on the cards for @heconghc with these mesmerizing Serpenti accessories. The elegance of this Cabochon bag mixed with the delicate geometries of these ‘True Colors’ sunglasses give a vibrant twist to the icon of seduction. Shop now.
.
.
Photo: @vanmosseveldeplusn 
Styling: @agata_belcen
.
#Serpenti #Bvlgari #BvlgariAccessories #MagnificentSummer #BvlgariSummer #BvlgariEyewear

node.text: It’s time for… extravagance. Introducing the Bvlgari Aluminium GMT watch, a spectacular feat of modern design. Featuring 24 time zones, waterproof to a depth of 100m, and encased in 40mm of aluminium and titanium — this incredible model celebrates the spirit of the traveler. Featuring: @alessandro.borghi, @alessiolapice, @matteobocelli, @alejandrospeitzer, @jaimelorentelo, and @fabriziobuonamassastigliani #Bvlgari #BvlgariWatches #BvlgariAluminium #GMT

node.accessibility_caption: Photo shared by BVLGARI Official on August 26, 2021 tagging @alessandro.borghi. May be an image of 1 person, beard, standing, wrist watch and suit.

node.text:
A revolution in sophistication.
@alessandro.borghi knows Bvlgari is the master of craft. And the Bvlgari Aluminium GMT meets the exuberance of an international lifestyle with a relaxed attitude. Feel at home everywhere with the unique red-tipped 24 hr hand — which encapsulates dual time capability inside the saga’s infamous rubber bezel. 
 
Photo: @monsieurtok 

#Bvlgari #BvlgariWatches #BvlgariAluminium #GMT
